name: deploy-cnn-chip-classifier
description: Deploy a trained convolutional neural network classifier on chips.

inputPortDescriptors.name: chips
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains the chips to deploy on. This should be the output of the chip-from-vrt task.

inputPortDescriptors.name: model
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains the trained model (as an h5 file) that will be used to classify the chips. This should be the output of the train-cnn-chip-classifier task.

inputPortDescriptors.name: classes
inputPortDescriptors.description: The classes to sort each polygon into. Different class names should be separated by commas and must be in the same order that the model was trained on (e.g- 'No swimming pool, Swimming pool'). If this is omitted the classes will be the same as those set in train-cnn-chip-classifier.

inputPortDescriptors.name: bit_depth
inputPortDescriptors.description: Int: number of bits in the input imagery. Defaults to 8

inputPortDescriptors.name: min_side_dim
inputPortDescriptors.description: Int: minimum acceptable side dimension (in pixels) of polygons to classify. Defaults to 0.

inputPortDescriptors.name: max_side_dim
inputPortDescriptors.description: Int: maximum acceptable side dimension (in pixels) of polygons to classify. If larger than the input shape to the network, all chips will be downsampled to match the input shape. Only use this feature if the model was also trained on downsampled imagery. Defaults to size of input to network.

outputPortDescriptors.name: classified_geojson
outputPortDescriptors.description: Contains the classified polygons in a geojson file.
